long_description: Offering invaluable information for climbers, the 2013 edition of. Compiled by The American Alpine Club and The Alpine Club of Canada. Softcover; 126 pages. American Alpine Club Press; copyright 2013. In refreshingly crisp, no-thrills prose, the facts surrounding scores of reported climbing accidents are presented and analyzed as lessons for others.
short_description: Offering invaluable information for climbers, the 2013 edition of Accidents in North American Mountaineering reports on known climbing accidents from Canada and the United States.
